title: Google Assistant Snapshot appears to finally, sadly, be gone for good
content:
After years of neglect, the spiritual successor to Google Now appears to be gone for good, with Google Assistant Snapshot disappearing widely across Android devices.

moreâ€¦

The post Google Assistant Snapshot appears to finally, sadly, be gone for good appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: After a few weeks of back and forth, it seems Google has finally fulfilled its promise of killing off Assistant Snapshot for Android users.
